articles.title: India has the most cervical cancer patients in Asia: Lancet - Economic Times
articles.description: The Lancet revealed that Africa followed Asia (20%), Europe (10%) and Latin America (10%) and more than half of deaths were estimated in Asia (58%) followed by Africa (22%), and Latin America (9%).
